alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 10:43AM CDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Heavy rain is resulting in significant rises on the Little Wabash River. The river is forecast to crest at Carmi Friday just above moderate flood stage. For the Little Wabash River...including Carmi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Flood waters flow up McHenry slough and areas near Route 1 and 14 in Carmi begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to moderate flood stage Thursday morning, then a crest of 32.3 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
